synopsis.text: Satan's ritual in Boston is disrupted when Dracula, the vampire king, absconds with the intended bride, Dolores. Instead of feeding on her, Dracula is captivated by her beauty and starts a family with her, resulting in the birth of their son, Janus. However, Dracula's enemies, including vengeful vampire hunters and Satan himself, are determined to destroy his newfound happiness. Stripped of his powers by Satan, Dracula must restore them by seeking another vampire's help to protect his family and confront his foes. In this thrilling tale of love, betrayal, and survival, Dracula must navigate through a web of danger to preserve his family and regain his rightful place as the king of vampires.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
